---
id: list-members
title: "List members"
description: "Returns a paginated list of members belonging to the specified space. Each member record includes the member’s profile ID, name, icon (which may be derived from an emoji or image), network identity, global name, status (e.g. joining, active) and role (e.g. Viewer, Editor, Owner). This endpoint supports collaborative features by allowing clients to show who is in a space and manage access rights."
sidebar_label: "List members"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List members"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/spaces/{space_id}/members"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a paginated list of members belonging to the specified space. Each member record includes the member’s profile ID, name, icon (which may be derived from an emoji or image), network identity, global name, status (e.g. joining, active) and role (e.g. Viewer, Editor, Owner). This endpoint supports collaborative features by allowing clients to show who is in a space and manage access rights.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

</Heading>
